description:
"Farna Minh, seeks a dangerous tool of Darkness on the icy moon Europa;  secretly shattering every bridge she made - including the one of her own Fireteam - on the way."

Currently in game:

- Placeholder CG's!(Please enjoy the silly sketches for now~)

- All endings (3+)

- The full script! Yay!

Plans for the full game:

- Over 10 fully finished CG’s

- Achievements (named appropriately as “Triumphs”)

- Unlockable lore tabs that are linked to achievements

A non-profit Destiny 2 Fan-game project, with no affiliation to Bungie.
